cancelTrade(uint256).details: Cancels a trade by the seller.

getTrade(uint256).details: - Returns the details for a trade.

openTrade(uint256).details: Opens a trade by the seller.

openTradeWhenCreateNewPhotoNFT(uint256,u.details: Opens a new trade. Puts _tokenId in escrow.

params._tokenId: The id for the tokenId to trade.
params._tokenPrice: The amount of currency for which to trade the tokenId.

transferOwnershipOfElpisHero(uint256,add.details: Executes a trade. Must have approved this contract to transfer the amount of currency specified to the seller. Transfers ownership of the elpisHero to the filler.

buyElpisHero(uint256).notice: - Buy function is that buy NFT token and ownership transfer. (Reference from IERC721.sol)- msg.sender buy NFT with ETH (msg.value)

openTradeWhenCreateNewPhotoNFT(uint256,u.notice: - This method is only executed when ElpisHero is created
